children.name: less than 5 km
children.information: A small tour, best paired with the shortest time range option

children.name: less than 10 km
children.information: A medium tour, best paired with the medium time range option

children.name: less than 20 km
children.information: A big tour, best paired with the longest time range option

children.name: less than 2 hours
children.information: A very short tour, usually has two or three locations in it, we recommend using the 'Explore' page to find single locations

children.name: less than 5 hours
children.information: A medium, recommended option. Eating break can be added

children.name: less than 8 hours
children.information: A long tour, might not work in very small cities or towns

children.name: by personal car
children.information: Having a personal vehicle might result in getting locations from farther away but also better rated

children.name: by bycicle
children.information: Locations closer to you location are preffered

children.name: by foot
children.information: A short distance will play a much more important role in selecting locations but you still might encounter big distances in the case of must-see locations

children.name: keep saved places
children.information: Have the places you saved from the explore tab (from around your current location) appear in the tour

children.name: remove saved places
children.information: Remove the places you saved from the explore tab letting the algorithm generate your tour from scratch
